articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: The official called for the creation of something akin to the International Atomic Energy Agency to regulate AI tech.
articles.title: Take AI Warnings Seriously, Says UN Secretary-General

articles.description: House Financial Services Committee leaders warned that the SEC’s suggested new definition of “exchange” would hurt innovation.
articles.title: Republicans Continue to Defend Crypto in Latest Letter to SEC

articles.description: The documentary, executive produced by musician Shaggy, debuted at the Tribeca Film Festival with help from Decentralized Pictures.
articles.title: 'Bad Like Brooklyn Dancehall' Brings Shaggy and Jamaican Culture to Tribeca

articles.author: Jose Antonio Lanz
articles.description: Generative AI could be a major player in the AI industry as a whole, which could be worth $15.7 trillion by 2030.
articles.title: AI Gold Rush: Generative AI Poised to Pump $4.4 Trillion Into Global Economy Annually

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: Francis X. Suarez has been an outspoken advocate of cryptocurrency since taking office in 2017.
articles.title: Miami's 'Bitcoin Mayor' Will Challenge Donald Trump for US President

articles.description: Congress invited crypto executives to testify on a bill that some say may undermine the SEC
articles.title: Crypto Leaders Praise Draft GOP Bill, Dems Raise Concerns

articles.description: Delio is the second South Korean platform to suspend withdrawals this week after Haru Invest.
articles.title: Crypto Lender Delio Freezes Withdrawals Citing 'Market Volatility'

articles.author: Andrew Throuvalas
articles.description: Prime Trust is set to be acquired by BitGo after a period of "garbage" spending last summer.
articles.title: Prime Trust Partner Banq Files for Bankruptcy Following BitGo Deal

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: ChatGPT plugins integrate other apps into the OpenAI chatbot, enhancing it with diverse, user-friendly AI features.
articles.title: Unleash ChatGPT: The Top 7 Plugins You Should Know in 2023

articles.description: Justin Kan was a co-founder of Twitch and now works on Fractal, a Web3 gaming startup. Kan tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about his new company and what he's up to.
articles.title: Fractal Is Like an Arcade, Says Twitch Co-Founder Justin Kan

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: REVIEW: Stack sats or eke out ETH in Ethereum Blast, a solid but simplistic (and ad-heavy) iOS and Android puzzle game.
articles.title: This Mobile Puzzle Game Earns You Bitcoin or Ethereum for Playing

articles.author: André Beganski
articles.description: It’s the first time the Fed has not raised rates at a meeting in 18 months.
articles.title: Bitcoin, Ethereum Trade Sideways as Fed Skips Rate Hike

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: The exchange said it's looking to focus elsewhere in Europe—and “will continue to comply with applicable laws of the European Union."
articles.title: Binance Set to Leave Cyprus Ahead of MiCA Legislation

articles.author: Tim Hakki
articles.description: At this year’s NFC, the Superduper founders stressed that getting NFTs to mass adoption won’t be easy.
articles.title: 'NFTs Can't Scale' in Current Form, Say Superduper Co-founders

articles.author: Pedro Solimano
articles.description: “I work on the largest Solana project, with more than 10 developers, and nobody is discussing [a hard fork]” said Matías Kudelski, a cyber security researcher who audits Solana’s code.
articles.title: Solana Hard Fork to Stave Off SEC? Devs Say It's Not Happening

articles.author: Alys Key
articles.description: MiCA comes into effect next year, but that doesn't mean crypto firms should wait to become compliant, said Chainalysis' EU policy lead.
articles.title: Crypto Firms Should Start Preparing for MiCA ‘Now–Maybe Even Yesterday’: Chainalysis

articles.author: Ryan Gladwin
articles.description: A day after the so-called Hinman documents were unsealed, XRP hasn't enjoyed the bullish effect that many enthusiasts had hoped.
articles.title: XRP Drops 5% as Markets Digest Hinman Documents, SEC Court Case

articles.author: Alys Key
articles.description: Allowing users to create their own versions of products is a “big step” for brands, BNV CEO Richard Hobbs told Decrypt.
articles.title: Fashion Brands Still ‘Nervous’ to Set IP Loose in Metaverse: BNV CEO

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: Any “serious discussion” about whether a token is a security should never again refer to Hinman’s speech, argued Ripple's legal chief.
articles.title: Ripple Legal Chief Calls for Investigation Into Former SEC Director Hinman

articles.author: Nivesh Rustgi
articles.description: The tokens powering various metaverse projects have failed to pump even after the highly anticipated launch of Apple’s new headset.
articles.title: Metaverse Tokens Lead Weekly Crypto Losses Amid SEC’s Securities Allegations

articles.author: Jose Antonio Lanz
articles.description: Because it’s about the message, and not about the messenger—or is it?
articles.title: AI Reverends Lead a Church Congregation of 300 in Germany

articles.author: Sander Lutz
articles.description: As music NFT platform Sound.xyz adds support for Ethereum layer-2 Optimism, the projects' co-founders deliver a rousing tribute to Vitalik.
articles.title: You Can Mint This Ridiculous Song About Vitalik Buterin as a Free NFT

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: The U.S. Court of Appeals for the Third Circuit had asked the SEC to clarify its position on a rulemaking petition from Coinbase.
articles.title: SEC Refuses to Respond to Coinbase’s Rulemaking Petition Following Lawsuit

articles.author: Pedro Solimano
articles.description: The U.S. Treasury is leading an interagency group that is researching a “potential” U.S. central bank digital currency.
articles.title: US 'Has Not Yet Determined Whether It Will Pursue a CBDC,' Says Treasury Official

articles.author: André Beganski
articles.description: The study uses ASIC model "fingerprints" to understand Bitcoin’s energy use, saying it's wrong to assume the same efficiency across mining rigs.
articles.title: How Much Energy Does Bitcoin Really Use? Less Than You Might Think

articles.author: Andrew Throuvalas
articles.description: The head of MicroStrategy says it’s time to accept that ‘Bitcoin is the next Bitcoin.’
articles.title: Bitcoin Will ‘10X’ With Regulatory Clarity, Says Michael Saylor

articles.author: Tom Farren
articles.description: Fewocious, a prominent Web3 artist, has teamed with the apparel giant to launch the Adidas Originals Campus 00s via NFT redemption ticket.
articles.title: Adidas Reveals Sneaker Collab With NFT Artist Fewocious

articles.description: Decrypt's Kate Irwin discusses the current regulatory climate in the U.S. with Gala Games' President of Blockchain Jason Brink.
articles.title: Are NFTs the Next SEC Target?

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: Lazarus Groupe hacked crypto wallet service Atomic Wallet earlier this month, Elliptic said.
articles.title: North Korean Hackers Pocketed More Than $100M in Atomic Wallet Hack

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: The Arbitrum-based NFT pass will let fans join the rapper’s summer tour via exclusive benefits.
articles.title: Snoop Dogg's NFT Tour Pass Lets Fans 'Travel the World' With Him Virtually

articles.author: Pedro Solimano
articles.description: Regulators say they'll welcome firms with "genuine operations and genuine business practices," which could mean an office or employees in Hong Kong.
articles.title: Hong Kong's New Crypto Rules Explained

articles.author: Ali Shutler
articles.description: Like Google's MusicLM, MusicGen can turn a descriptive text prompt into short clips of music.
articles.title: New Meta AI Music Tool Is Trained on 10,000 Hours of ‘Licensed Music’

articles.author: Ali Shutler
articles.description: The track will be out later this year with the help of AI technology developed in the making of Peter Jackson’s “Get Back” documentary.
articles.title: Paul McCartney Says 'Final' Beatles Song Coming Soon—Thanks to AI

articles.author: Nicholas Morgan
articles.description: The emails about former SEC director Williiam Hinman's 2018 speech saying Ethereum is not a security have been released.
articles.title: What's in the SEC's Hinman Emails and Do They Really Help Ripple?

articles.author: Tim Hakki
articles.description: Zerion’s head of growth unpacked the strategy of launching a mobile-first crypto wallet in an industry dominated by desktop competition.
articles.title: ‘Makes No Sense’ to Tether Crypto Users to Desktops, Says Zerion on Mobile Wallet Launch

articles.author: Tim Hakki
articles.description: Damus has been given 14 days to remove Bitcoin payments and implement in-app purchases or it will be removed from the App Store.
articles.title: Apple App Store Says Damus Has 2 Weeks to Cut Bitcoin Tipping or Get Booted

articles.author: Ali Shutler
articles.description: The celebrity stars’ Santo Spirits Club will reward users with “mystery” NFTs alongside real-world rewards.
articles.title: Guy Fieri and Sammy Hagar's Tequila Brand Launches NFT Loyalty Program

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: As the Hinman documents, referring to a speech from a former director, are finally released, the price of the XRP token has soared.
articles.title: XRP Jumps After Highly Anticipated Hinman Docs Are Unsealed

articles.author: Pedro Solimano
articles.description: The platform has announced its fourth version, open sourcing the draft core code for others to build upon.
articles.title: Uniswap Update Means 'The Possibilities Are Pretty Endless,' Says Developer

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: CCO and co-founder of Collab.Land Anjali Young explained at this year’s NFC Lisbon the origins of the crypto community tool kit, which industry niches are turning to its suite of products, and what’s next for the project since its token distribution event last February.
articles.title: Collab.Land Co-Founder Said There Was No ‘Aha Moment’ When Launching DAO Toolkit

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: With H.R. Giger's original "Alien" statue on full display at this year's NFC Lisbon, Particle CEO Harold Eytan told Decrypt that owning an NFT-ified slice of the piece isn't just for fans of the iconic creature and movie series but also for fine art collectors. Interested in owning a piece? Be prepared to cough up half an ETH for one of the 500 tranches of the digitized sculpture.
articles.title: Buying a Slice of H.R. Giger's 'Alien' Is Fine Art, Not Memorabilia: Particle CEO

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: The founder and CEO of metaverse fashion platform BNV Richard Hobbs said big brands are still nervous to let fans and community members customize their favorite garments. Still, he believes that as long as you can meet a firm's commercial bottom lines while stirring engagement, there's nothing to lose.
articles.title: Community Co-Creation 'Is a Big Step for Fashion Brands' Entering the Metaverse: BNV Founder and CEO

articles.description: Alok Vasudev is a co-founder of venture capital firm Standard Crypto. In an interview with Decrypt's Kate Irwin, he shares his thoughts on NFT marketing, NFT utility in gaming, and the stigma that pervades the industry.
articles.title: Standard Crypto VC Co-Founder on NFTs and Their Stigma in Gaming

articles.description: Ava Labs Head of Gaming Ed Chang shares news with Decrypt's Kate Irwin about the crypto firm's latest push to help traditional game developers break into blockchain gaming.
articles.title: Ava Labs Announces Avalanche Arcad3 for Game Developers at 3XP

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: At this year’s NFC Lisbon, multimedia artist and photographer YuLiang "YuYu" Liu broke down how themes from traditional painting and BDSM informed his latest NFT exhibition called “GAG.” He also shared exclusively with Decrypt a yet-to-be-launched drop for fans of his work.
articles.title: ‘Like a Middle Finger to Western Culture’: YuYu Unpacks Inspiration Behind NFT Expo GAG

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: Zerion's move to launch a mobile-first crypto wallet not only helped NFT users swap jpegs on the go but was also a play to get away from crypto's desktop-centric user experience. And with such little competition, Zerion's head of growth Alexander Guy told Decrypt at NFC Lisbon it's managed to rake in 150,000 funded wallets. Next step? Taking on MetaMask and contending as a browser-extension wallet.
articles.title: 'Competition Was Rather Low' in Mobile Wallet Space, Says Zerion Head of Growth

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: The Sandbox COO Sebastien Borget told Decrypt at this year’s NFC Lisbon that despite the high price point, Apple’s new VR headset is nonetheless “groundbreaking.” And though the tech giant never used the term “metaverse” in its reveal, Borget is sure that the technology will be key in growing participation in various digital worlds.
articles.title: ‘We’ve Never Seen Anything Like This in VR’, Says The Sandbox COO on Apple’s Vision Pro Headset

articles.description: Gala Games President of Blockchain shares his thoughts on the GALA token upgrade and the latest SEC turmoil with Decrypt's Kate Irwin.
articles.title: Is Gala Safe? Gala Games Head of Blockchain on GALA, Crypto, and SEC Regulatory Turmoil

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: Getting non-crypto artists to make the leap into Web3 comes in ebbs and flows according to the market’s bear and bull waves, says co-founder of NFT Club Berlin and Superteam Germany Rebekka Revel. But she’s hoping to change that by changing the narrative around digital collectibles, regardless of the market, one word at a time.
articles.title: Artists Adopting NFTs Has Been ‘Really Market Dependent’, Says NFT Club Berlin’s Rebekka Revel

articles.description: Co-founder and co-CEO of Web3 media brand Superduper Dom Smith says big brands are eager to enter the space—they just don’t know how. Still, they all maintain a thesis of turning their communities into “super fans” that generate value for users as well as a firm’s bottom line.
articles.title: Big Brands Exploring Web3 to ‘Scale Up Their Super-fan Base’: Superduper Co-founder

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: As his food mask creations went viral on the Internet during the COVID lockdowns, reposted on TikTok and Instagram without his consent, he soon asked: "How do I protect my digital files?" Performance artist Foodmasku describes at this year's NFC Lisbon how that simple question spiraled into a minting collection after collection of his edible works.
articles.title: How 1 Simple Question Kickstarted Performance Artist Foodmasku's Plunge Into NFTs

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: CEO and co-founder of Arianee Pierre Nicolas Hurstel unpacks the wide spectrum of digital collectibles from 10,000 PFP collections to access passes for exclusive events. And with an unannounced big brand soon joining, Hurstel revealed at NFC Lisbon which kind of NFTs big brands are moving towards.
articles.title: Arianee CEO Pegs Wine and Spirits as Next 'Exciting' Industry to Make Web3 Leap

articles.description: Words With Friends and Wildcard creator Paul Bettner tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about his perspective on what to do when NFTs become in-game characters and assets.
articles.title: Why 'Words With Friends' Creator Paul Bettner is 'Allergic' to Pay-to-Win NFTs

articles.description: Fractal and Twitch co-founder Justin Kan gives Decrypt's Kate Irwin an update on all things Fractal and his perspective on blockchain technology in gaming.
articles.title: Twitch Co-Founder Justin Kan: 18 Months is 'Several Decades' in Crypto

articles.description: Twitch and Fractal co-founder Justin Kan and Fractal co-founder Dan Borstelmann share their perspectives on Web3 gaming's changing landscape with Decrypt's Kate Irwin.
articles.title: Playing for Money in Web3 Games Not 'Durable,' Says Fractal's Justin Kan

articles.description: Everquest developer turned Avalon Chief Product Officer Jeffrey Butler tells Decrypt's Jason Nelson about how he got into game development.
articles.title: From Cyber Cafe to Web3: How Everquest Dev Jeffrey Butler Got Into Game Development

articles.description: Decrypt contributor Ryan S. Gladwin shares an inside look at The Machines Arena, an upcoming top-down 4v4 shooter from Directive Games that will offer NFTs minted on Ethereum sidechain network Ronin.
articles.title: The Machines Arena Game Preview: Is This the Next Overwatch?
